verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is my <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>; I shall not <S%H2637>want<s%>.
He makes me to lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in <S%H1877>green<s%> <S%H4999>pastures<s%>: he <S%H5095>leads<s%> me beside the <S%H4496>still<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>.
He <S%H7725>restores<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>: he <S%H5148>leads<s%> me in the <S%H4570>paths<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> for his <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake.

<S%H3212>Yes<s%>, though I walk through the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>, I will <S%H3372>fear<s%> no <S%H7451>evil<s%>: for you are with <S%H7626>me<s%>; your rod and your <S%H4938>staff<s%> they comfort <S%H5162>me<s%>.

You <S%H6186>prepare<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in the presence of my <S%H6887>enemies<s%>: you <S%H1878>anoint<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>; my <S%H3563>cup<s%> runs <S%H7310>over<s%>.

Surely <S%H2896>goodness<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> shall <S%H7291>follow<s%> me all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%>: and I will <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for <S%H753>ever<s%>.
